titles.title: A bill to amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide duty-free status for hosiery knitting machines and parts thereof, and for hosiery knitting needles.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 2/18/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to grant duty-free treatment to certain knitting machines and parts and knitting machine needles.
